docs.title: 王润琼 博士研究生在读
docs.text: 研究方向包括：切削刀具状态监测、智能制造、制造系统数字孪生等。

docs.title: 教育和工作履历
docs.text:
• 2020.09-至今，博士研究生，山东大学机械工程学院
  • 2018.08-2020.08，工程师，现代汽车研发中心(中国)有限公司
  • 2015.09-2018.01，硕士，东北大学机械工程与自动化学院

docs.title: 论文
docs.text:
1. Wang R, Song Q, Liu Z, et al. Multi-condition identification in milling Ti-6Al-4V thin-walled parts based on sensor fusion[J]. Mech Syst Signal Process 2022;164:108264.(第一作者, IF=8.934,中科院一区Top期刊,被引14次)
  2. Wang R, Zhu L, Zhu C. Research on fractal model of normal contact stiffness for mechanical joint considering asperity interaction[J]. Int J Mech Sci 2017;134:357–69. (第一作者, IF=6.772,中科院一区Top期刊, 被引55次)
  3. Wang R, Song Q, Liu Z, et al. A Novel Unsupervised Machine Learning-Based Method for Chatter Detection in the Milling of Thin-Walled Parts[J]. Sensors 2021;21:5779. (第一作者, IF=3.847, 被引12次)
  4. Wang R, Song Q, Peng Y, et al. A milling tool wear monitoring method with sensing generalization capability[J]. J Manuf Syst 2023 Accept (第一作者, IF=9.498,中科院一区Top期刊)
  5. 王润琼,朱立达,朱春霞.基于域扩展因子和微凸体相互作用的结合面接触刚度模型研究[J]. 机械工程学报, 2018(19):8. (第一作者, 被引27次, EI检索)

docs.title: 专利
docs.text:
1. 宋清华(导师第一),王润琼,刘战强等,一种多传感信号融合监测薄壁件铣削数据降维方法及系统,ZL202110179639.0. 授权日期:2022-04-22
  2. 王润琼,朱立达,倪陈兵等,一种考虑粗糙表面微凸体相互作用影响的确定受载结合部法向接触刚度的方法,ZL201710029431.4. 授权日期：2020-06-16
  3. 宋清华(导师第一),王润琼,刘战强等,一种切削信号多域特征高质融合及融合特征性能评价方法,ZL202211156530.6. 申请日期:2022-09-22
  4. 宋清华(导师第一),王润琼,刘战强等,一种在线监测薄壁件铣削刀具状态的特征强化方法及系统,ZL202210366357.6. 申请日期:2022-04-08

docs.title: 荣誉奖项
docs.text:
• 山东大学机械工程学院优博选育计划
  • 山东大学博士生课题中期考核优秀奖
  • 辽宁省优秀硕士学位论文
  • 山东大学优秀研究生、东北大学优秀研究生

docs.title: SDUME Dataset for Tool condition monitoring
docs.text: The milling experiments are still on-going. Dataset will be released after the experiments.

docs.title: Runqiong Wang  Ph.D. Student
docs.text: His research interests include cutting tool condition monitoring, intelligent manufacturing, and digital twins of manufacturing systems.

docs.title: Education and Working Experience
docs.text:
• 2020.09-Now, Ph.D. Student, School of Mechanical Engineering, Shandong University
  • 2018.08-2020.08, Mechanical Engineer, Hyundai Motor R&D Center (China)
  • 2015.09-2018.01, M.E., Northeastern University (China)

docs.title: Articles
docs.text:
1. Wang R, Song Q, Liu Z, et al. Multi-condition identification in milling Ti-6Al-4V thin-walled parts based on sensor fusion[J]. Mech Syst Signal Process 2022;164:108264.(IF=8.934, JCR Q1)
  2. Wang R, Zhu L, Zhu C. Research on fractal model of normal contact stiffness for mechanical joint considering asperity interaction[J]. Int J Mech Sci 2017;134:357–69. ( IF=6.772, JCR Q1)
  3. Wang R, Song Q, Liu Z, et al. A Novel Unsupervised Machine Learning-Based Method for Chatter Detection in the Milling of Thin-Walled Parts[J]. Sensors 2021;21:5779. ( IF=3.847,)
  4. Wang R, Song Q, Peng Y, et al. A milling tool wear monitoring method with sensing generalization capability[J]. J Manuf Syst 2023; Accept (IF=9.498, JCR Q1)
